text:
My little state and my amazing governor @GovRaimondo show that it's possible - with good leadership - to turn the tide on #covid19: as she says, just "Do the damn job."

Ps, you've got to read on for the story of the *empty truck* of PPE. 
https://t.co/94EPaPRgQC
